channel.title: io on 虫子樱桃
channel.description: Recent content in io on 虫子樱桃

item.title: Golang io.Pipe 使用
item.description: 介绍 // Pipe creates a synchronous in-memory pipe. // It can be used to connect code expecting an io.Reader // with code expecting an io.Writer. // // Reads and Writes on the pipe are matched one to one // except when multiple Reads are needed to consume a single Write. // That is, each Write to the PipeWriter blocks until it has satisfied // one or more Reads from the PipeReader that fully consume // the written data.
